question: Which of the following statements is correct about the FAME India Scheme?
option1: It aims to promote Agripreneurs and Agri Start-ups in the country
option2: It encourages the development and use of hybrid and electric vehicles in the country
option3: It encourages individuals as well as groups for solar power production by installing rooftop solar plants over the houses and buildings
option4: It aims at recapitalisation of public sector banks by financing through “recapitalization bonds”
answer: It encourages the development and use of hybrid and electric vehicles in the country
explanation: FAME India Scheme is an initiative by the Ministry of Heavy Industries & Public Enterprises. FAME India Scheme [Faster Adoption and Manufacturing of (Hybrid &) Electric Vehicles in India]. It has been launched with the objective to support hybrid/electric vehicles market development and Manufacturing eco-system. The scheme has 4 focus areas i.e. Technology development, Demand Creation, Pilot Projects and Charging Infrastructure.
